javadoc: DBContentHandler provides an abstract ContentHandler for domain object content which is stored within a database file. This class provides helper methods for working with database files.

methods.name: createFile
methods.comment:
Create a new database file from an open database handle.
 If fs is versioned, the resulting item is marked as checked-out
 within the versioned file-system.  The specified domainObj
 will become associated with the newly created database.

params.name: path
params.comment: the path of the new file

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the new file

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the monitor that allows the user to cancel

throws.comment: if the name contains invalid characters
if the user cancels the operation

methods.javadoc: Return user data content type corresponding to associatedContentType.
methods.name: getUserDataContentType
methods.comment: Return user data content type corresponding to associatedContentType.

methods.name: openAssociatedUserFile

name: DBContentHandler
comment:
DBContentHandler provides an abstract ContentHandler for 
 domain object content which is stored within a database file.
 This class provides helper methods for working with database files.
